sentences.en: And the researchers say our brains might like these chords because their frequencies resemble those of a single harmonic note.
sentences.cn: 研究人员表示，我们的大脑喜欢这些和弦，可能是因为这些频率与一个单谐波音符类似。

sentences.en: For a harmonic oscillator the energy levels are evenly spaced.
sentences.cn: 对谐振子来说,能级是等间隔的.

sentences.en: I had been looking for ways to combine harmonic and rhythmic struc-tures.
sentences.cn: 我过去一直在寻找将和声和节奏结合起来的方法。

sentences.en: I had been looking for ways to combine harmonic and rhythmic structures.
sentences.cn: 我过去一直在寻找将和声和节奏结合起来的方法。

sentences.en: In the dynamic case motion is often harmonic.
sentences.cn: 在动态情况下,运动通常为谐运动.

sentences.en: It is also called a harmonic equation.
The above analysis may readily be extended to general plane disturbances not necessarily harmonic.
sentences.cn: 上面的分析可以很容易地引申到普遍的而不一定是简谐的平面扰动.

sentences.en: The angular part of a continuum wave function is, of course, a spherical harmonic.
sentences.cn: 连续谱波函数的角度部分当然是球谐函数.

sentences.en: The balance wheel of a watch is a familiar example of angular harmonic motion.
sentences.cn: 钟表的摆轮是角谐运动的常例.

sentences.en: The effect is termed harmonic distortion.
sentences.cn: 这种作用就称为谐波畸变.

sentences.en: The harmonic oscillator is an exceptionally important example of periodic motion.
sentences.cn: 谐振子在周期运动中是特别重要的.

sentences.en: The jingling piano at last is silent, and the Harmonic friends rally round their pillows.
sentences.cn: 叮叮当当的钢琴声终于停止, 和声学会的朋友们抱着枕头睡觉了.

sentences.en: The polynomial factors in the harmonic - oscillator wave functions are called Hermite polynomials after a French mathematician.
sentences.cn: 谐振子波函数的多项式因子随一法国数学家之名而叫做厄米多项式.

sentences.en: The system executes simple harmonic motion.
There is an infinite number of harmonic - frequency components.
sentences.cn: 这里存在着数目无穷的谐频分量.

sentences.en: We can work out positions of a harmonic oscillator by numerical methods.
sentences.cn: 我们可以按数值方法计算简谐振子的位置.

trans.tran_en: relating to the way notes are played or sung together to give a pleasing sound
